OrgName: The Estée Lauder Companies Inc. subsidiaries specified below
activities: This certification applies to the following U.S. subsidiaries of The Estée Lauder Companies Inc.: Aveda Corporation, Bumble and Bumble LLC, Bumble and Bumble Products LLC, ELC Management LLC, Make-up Art Cosmetics Inc., and ELC Beauty LLC.  The entities covered by this certification are collectively referred to herein as “Estée Lauder.”  Estée Lauder obtains and processes personal data about any current, former and prospective employee, temporary staff, contractor and consultant of Estée Lauder or any of its subsidiaries and affiliates.  Estée Lauder also may obtain and process personal data of any dependent, beneficiary and other related individual about whom such employee, temporary staff, contractor or consultant provides information to Estée Lauder in connection with the employment relationship.  Estée Lauder obtains and processes certain personal data to conduct and support human resources functions and activities, including (1) recruiting and hiring job applicants, (2) onboarding, (3) managing employee headcount, (4) managing employee performance, (5) talent management, (6) managing a global employee directory, (7) facilitating a global anti-bribery and corruption compliance program, (8) administering a whistleblowing hotline, (9) employee development and training, (10) supporting, responding to and communicating with employees, (11) managing employee grievances and disputes and carrying out investigations, (12) determining employee compensation and managing the payroll process, (13) managing employee benefits, (14) career and succession planning, (15) managing the employee separation and termination process, (16) disaster recovery and other business continuity planning, (17) access security controls, (18) complying with applicable legal obligations, and (19) other general human resources purposes.
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President, Global Human Resources
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human resources data, including manually processed data
recoursemech: The relevant EU and/or Swiss Data Protection Authorities
